name: Runmin Cong
content: Runmin Cong Runmin Cong Home Profile Publications MVP Group 中文简介 Contact Runmin Cong, a Professor with the School of Control Science and Engineering, Shandong University (SDU), Jinan, China. Dr. Cong is the director of Multimedia and Vision Processing Group (MVP Group), which is affiliated to the Key Laboratory of Machine Intelligence & System Control，Ministry of Education. His current research interests include Artificial Intelligence, Pattern Recognition, Machine Learning, Low-altitude Intelligence, and Embodied Perception. He has published more than 120 IEEE/ACM Trans/CCF-A papers, and has received more than 20 awards, including the IEEE Chester W. Sall Award. 丛润民，山东大学控制科学与工程学院教授、博士生导师、国家高层次青年人才计划入选者，主要研究方向包括人工智能、模式识别、机器学习、低空智能、具身感知等。在TPAMI、IJCV、CVPR、NeurIPS等CCF-A、IEEE/ACM Trans上发表论文120余篇， 获天津市科学技术进步一等奖、中国煤炭工业协会科学技术奖一等奖、中国图象图形学学会自然科学奖二等奖、山东计算机学会自然科学奖一等奖、IEEE Chester W. Sall 奖等。 Open Positions: I am looking for self-motivated candidates who have solid mathematical backgrounds, strong English ability, and strong coding skills, including senior undergraduate and postgraduate. If you are interested in doing research on Computer Vision and Machine Learning, please drop me an e-mail (rmcong@sdu.edu.cn) with your detailed CV. 招收山东大学2026级博士生1-2名，硕士研究生1-2名（保研），欢迎电邮咨询 (rmcong@sdu.edu.cn). 招收博士后1-2名，相关待遇请点击查询，欢迎电邮咨询 (rmcong@sdu.edu.cn).
